demos.name: The Mahabharatha
demos.notes: An ancient Indian epic about the Kurukshetra War between the Kauravas and the Pandavas.

demos.name: 12 Angry Men
demos.notes: A 1957 American courtroom drama film that follows a jury deliberating the conviction or acquittal of a defendant.

demos.name: Les Misérables
demos.notes: A French historical novel by Victor Hugo, first published in 1862, that is considered one of the greatest novels of the 19th century.
